Gerard's bag is swapped in the airport. He is given a duffel filled with cocaine.

Gerard takes it home, we meet his wife, see his domestic bliss.

Gerard discovers the cocaine in his bag. As he's getting ready to go into hiding, two Irish agents show up at his door armed with bats.

He uses his home field advantage and the element of surprise to overcome them, and then flees.

He tries to call Scarlett to warn her, but she's already been kidnapped to use as leverage.

He receives call saying that if he wants to see his wife again, he'll do exactly as the voice in the phone says.

He brings the drugs to a mysterious building where he finds his wife with Jenzen having a great time.
